page.title: 19BUS SERVICES
page.content: The majority of villagers,particularly in Whitemoor, where there is only one General Store, need to travel to St.Austell for shopping in the larger stores. {Cornwall Bus and Coachways}provide service transport in the form of mainly double or single decker buses, supplied by Leyland National and running on diesel. The{St.Austell to Newquay}service passes through{Whitemoor}on Mondays to Saturdays 9 times daily during the Summer period.The{St.Austell to St. {Dennis}service calls 3 times daily. The {St.Austell to Bodmin}service bus calls twice daily and there is a service that terminates at{Roche}each morning that travels via Bugle. Fare from Whitemoor to St.Austell is Â£1.30 return;from Roche to St.Austell is Â£1.10 return.Single Â£0.77 both routes.
